casebody.data:
Karl HALLIGAN, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
John O'CONNOR, Defendant-Movant,
and
Harry Hodkinson and H & H Real Estate Investments, LLC, Defendants. M-1032/1033 September Term 2018
082036 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JUNE 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for an extension of time within which to file a motion for leave to appeal (M-1032) is granted; and it is further.

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1033) is denied.
